name: Ikuchi
description: The Ikuchi is a gargantuan elemental creature that embodies chaotic forces of nature in aquatic environments, constantly emitting a thick, yellowish oil when submerged.
memorable: It can create difficult terrain with its nonflammable oil and grapple opponents with great reach.
goals: Survival and instinct-driven behavior in its aquatic habitat.
relations: Often encountered in aquatic settings, this elemental may interact with other water-based creatures.
environment: Typically found in underwater locations where it can exert control over its surroundings with its oil.
strengths: Immune to poison, resistant to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical damage types, lacking inherent resistances against them.
attacks: Multiattack with a fierce bite and constricting appendage, capable of grappling foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Crush ability can severely damage all creatures it grapples, emphasizing its dominance in melee.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 14, reflecting its keen awareness of its environment.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its ability to sense threats.
additional_information: Constantly emits thick oil when submerged, making the area difficult terrain.
Can breathe only underwater, remaining submerged without surfacing.
Grapples opponents, restricting their movement and control.
Extensive reach for grappling attacks, targeting foes from afar.
Excellent durability with high hit points and natural armor.
test_queries: thick oil creates difficult terrain underwater
chaotic neutral elemental in aquatic environments
